# Portfolio Project - Adithya Sharma

## Project Type
React developer portfolio with Vite

## Developer Profile
- **Name**: Adithya Sharma
- **Role**: Full Stack Developer & ML Engineer
- **Email**: adithyasharma2005@gmail.com
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/Hokage-Adithya
- **LinkedIn**: https://www.linkedin.com/in/adithya-sharma-8bb11b26a/

## Sections
- Hero/Landing - Animated hero with social links
- About Me - Personal introduction with statistics
- Skills - Technical skills organized by category
- Projects/Work - Featured projects showcase
- Experience - Professional timeline
- Contact - Contact form and information
- Resume/CV - Download link in navigation

## Design Style
Colorful and creative with smooth animations, gradient backgrounds, and interactive hover effects

## Featured Projects
1. Jarvis Voice Assistant - Python virtual assistant with speech recognition
2. Voice-Based Gender Detection - ML model for audio classification
3. Spam Mail Detection - Email classification using NLP
4. UrTasks - React to-do list application
5. Netflix Clone - Frontend UI clone
